original_title: Petrol & Diesel prices reduced from Sunday (30) might
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st) – The prices of fuel have been reduced with effect from midnight on Sunday (30).
This was confirmed by State Minister of Power and Energy D.V. Chanaka.

CID calls for report over officers involved in Mahara Prison shooting
